sudo apt update && sudo apt dist-upgrade -y && sudo apt autoremove -y && sudo apt autoclean

sudo visudo

m ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/apt

Right-click on your desktop or XFCE panel and select Create Launcher.

Fill in the details:

Name: Update System

Comment: Update, Upgrade, and Clean

Command: xfce4-terminal -e 'sh -c "sudo apt update && sudo apt dist-upgrade -y && sudo apt autoremove -y && sudo apt autoclean; read -p \"Done. Press enter to close...\""'

Crucial: Ensure "Run in terminal" is checked. This allows you to see the progress and any potential errors.

Pick an icon (like a "system-software-update" icon) and click Create
